item.title: Clojure Thread First vs Thread Last Macros
item.description: In this post, I am going to show you {when|how} to use Clojure marcos, ->> aka thread-last and -> aka thread-first. In some case, -> and ->> may perform the same operation if you do not pay enough attention. So I will also show you what’s the difference between them. Note that doc -> and docs ->> din’t make sense for me at first, so if same thing happened to you I hope that this post will make it clear.
